name: Dstroy
description:
Dstroy is Bomberman-like game, and a remake of the original Dstroy for DOS/Amiga for Windows, Linux, Nintendo DS, and Gp2X.

The game uses the original data files, including graphics and music. But it has made some change with the menus.

Like the original it features an Adventure mode, where 1-4 players cooperate to kill all monsters on the level by placing bombs, and collecting pick-ups. After five completed levels, a special boss level is present, before starting over on a new world, featuring other sprites as surroundings, monsters, and blocks.

The other mode is called Fight where 2-4 players play a deathmatch mode where the last player standing is the winner.
